类 CTriangle

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.shapes.CShape
org.kelvinizer.shapes.CTriangle
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable
public class CTriangle extends CShape
Represents a triangle shape defined by three points. Extends the CShape class and provides specific implementation for converting to a Polygon and scaling the triangle.
另请参阅:
  • CShape

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    CTriangle()
    Constructs a triangle with all points initialized to (0, 0).
    CTriangle(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
    Constructs a triangle with the specified coordinates for its three points.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CTriangle

      public CTriangle(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
      Constructs a triangle with the specified coordinates for its three points.
      参数:
      x1 - the x-coordinate of the first point
      y1 - the y-coordinate of the first point
      x2 - the x-coordinate of the second point
      y2 - the y-coordinate of the second point
      x3 - the x-coordinate of the third point
      y3 - the y-coordinate of the third point

    • CTriangle

      public CTriangle()
      Constructs a triangle with all points initialized to (0, 0).
